title: Ivan Selesnick
text: Ivan Selesnick is an <a href="electrical%20engineer">electrical engineer</a> from the <a href="NYU%20Polytechnic%20School%20of%20Engineering">NYU Polytechnic School of Engineering</a> in Brooklyn, New York. He was named a <a href="Fellow%20of%20the%20Institute%20of%20Electrical%20and%20Electronics%20Engineers">Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers</a> (IEEE) in 2016 for his contributions to <a href="wavelet">wavelet</a> and sparsity based <a href="signal%20processing">signal processing</a>.
